instruction: 将路径 root.children[0].children[1] 的文字颜色改为orange
input: {"tag":"root","content":"","path":"root","attributes":{},"semantic_features":"文档根节点","children":[{"tag":"h1","content":"SmartPath 2.0 协议验证","path":"root.children[0]","attributes":{"color":"rgb(0, 122, 255)"},"semantic_features":"1级标题","children":[{"tag":"p","content":"本段落现在逻辑上属于上方 H1 的子节点。","path":"root.children[0].children[0]","attributes":{},"semantic_features":"段落正文","children":[]},{"tag":"h2","content":"1. 嵌套寻址测试","path":"root.children[0].children[1]","attributes":{"color":"rgb(51, 51, 51)"},"semantic_features":"2级标题","children":[{"tag":"p","content":"这个 P 标签是 H2 的子节点。","path":"root.children[0].children[1].children[0]","attributes":{},"semantic_features":"段落正文","children":[]},{"tag":"p","content":"这个 P 也是 H2 的，因为它们都在下一个标题之前。","path":"root.children[0].children[1].children[1]","attributes":{},"semantic_features":"段落正文","children":[]}]},{"tag":"h2","content":"2. 兄弟标题测试","path":"root.children[0].children[2]","attributes":{"color":"rgb(51, 51, 51)"},"semantic_features":"2级标题","children":[{"tag":"p","content":"这里的结构会被重新组织为逻辑树。","path":"root.children[0].children[2].children[0]","attributes":{},"semantic_features":"段落正文","children":[]}]}]}]}

instruction: 将路径 root.children[0].children[2].children[0] 的内容修改为"修改后的文本"
input: {"tag":"root","content":"","path":"root","attributes":{},"semantic_features":"文档根节点","children":[{"tag":"h1","content":"SmartPath 2.0 协议验证","path":"root.children[0]","attributes":{"color":"rgb(0, 122, 255)"},"semantic_features":"1级标题","children":[{"tag":"p","content":"本段落现在逻辑上属于上方 H1 的子节点。","path":"root.children[0].children[0]","attributes":{},"semantic_features":"段落正文","children":[]},{"tag":"h2","content":"1. 嵌套寻址测试","path":"root.children[0].children[1]","attributes":{"color":"rgb(51, 51, 51)"},"semantic_features":"2级标题","children":[{"tag":"p","content":"这个 P 标签是 H2 的子节点。","path":"root.children[0].children[1].children[0]","attributes":{},"semantic_features":"段落正文","children":[]},{"tag":"p","content":"这个 P 也是 H2 的，因为它们都在下一个标题之前。","path":"root.children[0].children[1].children[1]","attributes":{},"semantic_features":"段落正文","children":[]}]},{"tag":"h2","content":"2. 兄弟标题测试","path":"root.children[0].children[2]","attributes":{"color":"rgb(51, 51, 51)"},"semantic_features":"2级标题","children":[{"tag":"p","content":"这里的结构会被重新组织为逻辑树。","path":"root.children[0].children[2].children[0]","attributes":{},"semantic_features":"段落正文","children":[]}]}]}]}

instruction: 将路径 root.children[0].children[0] 的文字颜色改为green
